ActJudges Act
SubjectBateman, the Hon. Nancy J. ** RESIGNATION AND ANNUITY ** Court of Appeal of NC
PrecisResignation and granting of an annuity to the Hon. NANCY J. BATEMAN, a Judge of the Nova Scotia Court of Appeal effective August 4, 2010.
